Toxic bullshit most of the time. But when you clutch or make a sick play its better than drugs.

This game used to be good, then the devs neglected it for some years and I fell out of love with the game. With Valorant coming out it seems that the devs are starting to pick their shit up again so I am redownloading. 

I felt compelled to give a thumbs up when redownloading the game because I saw that I have logged 1373 hours into the game. Any game that has stolen that much time from me must atleast deserve a thumbs up.

Been playing since 1.6 and Source. CS:GO just adds on to the fun.

Not much play time in the game, but really wish I had the opportunity to have more. I feel all these years I have missed out on a true gem. Competitive scene is amazing and the style of game play requires skill unlike arcade style shooters. I've put probably around 15 hours or so of my 35 hours in the last couple weeks prior to Valorant. Now off to a game dream come true.
